title: Deborah Kaple, “Gulag Boss: A Soviet Memoir” (Oxford UP, 2010)
description:
Here’s something remarkable: at some point in the future, something you believe to be just fine will be utterly disdained by the greater part of humanity. For instance, it is at least imaginable that one day everyone will believe that zoos were [NB] profoundly immoral. The future will condemn us...
